topics.body:
OK, just fixed the game from auto-closing.
I reduced the graphics to a minimum, especially the bumpmapping.

Now, I just need to test the recording.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

topics.body:
I reduced the resolution to a low.
Now the facecam and the game is running smoothly.
But now I'm so tired.

I just spent 6 hours doing this tweaking.
